00021 
00023         class ModuleHandle
00024         {
00025         public:
00026                 typedef detail::MODULE_MAP_ENTRY* (*GET_MAP_FUNC)();
00027                 typedef void (*INIT_FUNC)();
00028                 typedef void (*SHUTDOWN_FUNC)();
00029 
00031 
00032                 class iterator
00033                 {
00034                         friend class ModuleHandle;
00035 
00036                 public:
00037                         bool operator ==(const iterator& rhs) const { return m_pEntry == rhs.m_pEntry; }
00038                         bool operator !=(const iterator& rhs) const { return !(*this == rhs); }
00039                         iterator& operator++() { ASSERT_STRICT(m_pEntry); ++m_pEntry; checkEnd(); return *this; }
00040                         iterator operator++(int) { iterator ret(*this); ++*this; return ret; }
00041                         const guid* ClassID() const { return m_pEntry->pClsid; }
00042                         reflection::user_type* ReflectedType() const { return (m_pEntry->pTypeOf) ? m_pEntry->pTypeOf() : 0; }
00043 
00044                         iterator() : m_pEntry(0) { }
00045                         iterator(const iterator& other) : m_pEntry(other.m_pEntry) { }
00046 
00047                 private:
00048                         iterator(detail::MODULE_MAP_ENTRY* entry) : m_pEntry(entry) { }
00049                         void checkEnd() { if(!m_pEntry->pClsid) m_pEntry = 0; }
00050                         detail::MODULE_MAP_ENTRY* m_pEntry;
00051                 };
00052 
00054 
00056                 ModuleHandle();
00057 
00059                 ModuleHandle(const char* moduleName);
00060 
00062                 ModuleHandle(GET_MAP_FUNC mapFunc);
00063 
00065                 ModuleHandle(const ModuleHandle& other);
00066 
00068                 ModuleHandle& operator=(const ModuleHandle& rhs);
00069 
00071                 virtual ~ModuleHandle();
00072 
00074                 HResult Init(const char* moduleName);
00075 
00077                 void Shutdown();
00078 
00080                 void Release();
00081 
00083                 bool IsLoaded() const;
00084 
00086                 iterator MapBegin() const;
00087 
00089                 iterator MapEnd() const;

00096

00101 
00103 
00104                 reflection::user_type* GetType(SF_RIID clsid) const;
00105 
00106         private:
00107 
00108                 struct ModuleHandleImpl;
00109                 ModuleHandleImpl* m_impl;
00110         };

00120 template<class Itf>
00121 module::HResult create_instance(Itf** outObj, SF_RIID clsid, const module::ModuleHandle& m)
00122 {
00123         return m.CreateInstance(clsid, UUID_PPV(Itf, outObj));
00124 }

00129 module::HResult create_instance(module::com_ptr<Itf>& ptr, SF_RIID clsid, const module::ModuleHandle& m)

00131         return m.CreateInstance(clsid, UUID_PPV(Itf, ptr.wrapped()));
